languages.text: {n}Префект, в свою очередь, говорит тихо, но вы слышите каждое слово, как если бы она стояла рядом с вами.{/n} "Ваша предшественница Теодора, да озарит свет Трона ее посмертный путь, всегда шла навстречу потребностям обоих Адептус, отдавая себе отчет о благословенности труда нашего и значимости оного для Империума. Не говоря уже о том, что она почитала законы собственной династии".

{n}The prefect, on the other hand, speaks softly, and yet, you can hear every word as if she were standing directly beside you:{/n} "Your predecessor, Lady Theodora — may the light of the Throne illuminate her path in death — always sought to address the needs of both the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites, because she realised how blessed and important our work is for the good of the Imperium — to say nothing of the fact that she honoured the laws of her own dynasty."
languages.original_text: {n}Префект, в свою очередь, говорит тихо, но вы слышите каждое слово, как если бы она стояла рядом с вами.{/n} "Ваша предшественница Теодора, да озарит свет Трона ее посмертный путь, всегда шла навстречу потребностям обоих Адептус, отдавая себе отчет о благословенности труда нашего и значимости оного для Империума. Не говоря уже о том, что она почитала законы собственной династии".

traits.locale_text: {n}The prefect, on the other hand, speaks softly, and yet, you can hear every word as if she were standing directly beside you:{/n} "Your predecessor, Lady Theodora, may the light of the Throne illuminate her path in death, always sought to address the needs of both the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites because she realised how blessed and important our work is for the good of the Imperium — to say nothing of the fact that she honoured the laws of her own dynasty."

{n}The prefect, on the other hand, speaks softly, and yet, you can hear every word as if she were standing directly beside you:{/n} "Your predecessor, Lady Theodora, may the light of the Throne illuminate her path in death, always sought to address the needs of both the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites because she realised how blessed and important our work is for the good of the Imperium — to say nothing of the fact that she honoured the laws of her own dynasty."

{n}The prefect, on the other hand, speaks softly, and yet, you can hear every word as if she were standing directly beside you:{/n} "Your predecessor, Lady Theodora — may the light of the Throne illuminate her path in death — always sought to address the needs of both the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites, because she realised how blessed and important our work is for the good of the Imperium — to say nothing of the fact that she honoured the laws of her own dynasty."

{n}The prefect, on the other hand, speaks softly, and yet, you can hear every word as if she were standing directly beside you:{/n} "Your predecessor, Lady Theodora — may the light of the Throne illuminate her path in death — always sought to address the needs of both the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites, because she realised how blessed and important our work is for the good of the Imperium — to say nothing of the fact that she honoured the laws of her own dynasty."

{n}The prefect, on the other hand, speaks softly, and yet, you can hear every word as if she were standing directly beside you:{/n} "Your predecessor, Lady Theodora — may the light of the Throne illuminate her path in death — always sought to address the needs of both the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites, because she realised how blessed and important our work is for the good of the Imperium — to say nothing of the fact that she honoured the laws of her own dynasty."

{n}The prefect, on the other hand, speaks softly, and yet, you can hear every word as if she were standing directly beside you:{/n} "Your predecessor, Lady Theodora — may the light of the Throne illuminate her path in death — always sought to address the needs of both the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites, because she realised how blessed and important our work is for the good of the Imperium — to say nothing of the fact that she honoured the laws of her own dynasty."

languages.text: {n}La préfète, quant à elle, s'exprime d'une voix douce, et pourtant, vous entendez chacun de ses mots comme si elle se tenait juste à côté de vous :{/n} « Votre prédécesseure, dame Théodora, puisse la lumière du Trône la guider dans l'au-delà, s'est toujours efforcée de répondre aux besoins de l'Adeptus Administratum comme de l'Adeptus Arbites parce qu'elle avait compris le caractère ô combien sacré de notre travail, et son importance pour le bien de l'Imperium... sans même parler du fait qu'elle honorait les lois de sa propre dynastie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect, on the other hand, speaks softly, and yet, you can hear every word as if she were standing directly beside you:{/n} "Your predecessor, Lady Theodora — may the light of the Throne illuminate her path in death — always sought to address the needs of both the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites, because she realised how blessed and important our work is for the good of the Imperium — to say nothing of the fact that she honoured the laws of her own dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}La préfète, quant à elle, s'exprime d'une voix douce, et pourtant, vous entendez chacun de ses mots comme si elle se tenait juste à côté de vous :{/n} « Votre prédécesseure, dame Théodora, puisse la lumière du Trône la guider dans l'au-delà, s'est toujours efforcée de répondre aux besoins de l'Adeptus Administratum comme de l'Adeptus Arbites parce qu'elle avait compris le caractère ô combien sacré de notre travail, et son importance pour le bien de l'Imperium... sans même parler du fait qu'elle honorait les lois de sa propre dynastie. »

languages.text: {n}La prefecta, en cambio, habla con suavidad y, sin embargo, escuchas claramente cada palabra como si estuviera a tu lado:{/n} «Su predecesora, lady Theodora, que la luz del Trono ilumine su camino en la muerte, siempre quiso atender a las necesidades del Adeptus Administratum y el Adeptus Arbites porque comprendía lo sagrado e importante que es nuestro trabajo para el bien del Imperium... por no hablar del hecho de que honraba las leyes de su propia dinastía».
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect, on the other hand, speaks softly, and yet, you can hear every word as if she were standing directly beside you:{/n} "Your predecessor, Lady Theodora — may the light of the Throne illuminate her path in death — always sought to address the needs of both the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites, because she realised how blessed and important our work is for the good of the Imperium — to say nothing of the fact that she honoured the laws of her own dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}La prefecta, en cambio, habla con suavidad y, sin embargo, escuchas claramente cada palabra como si estuviera a tu lado:{/n} «Su predecesora, lady Theodora, que la luz del Trono ilumine su camino en la muerte, siempre quiso atender a las necesidades del Adeptus Administratum y el Adeptus Arbites porque comprendía lo sagrado e importante que es nuestro trabajo para el bien del Imperium... por no hablar del hecho de que honraba las leyes de su propia dinastía».

languages.text: {n}行政官以轻柔的声音开了口。尽管她的声音很轻，但每个字你都听得清清楚楚，就仿佛她站在你身边一样。{/n}“您的前任行商浪人，西奥多拉夫人，愿黄金王座的光芒照亮她的灵魂之路。她生前从不吝惜资源，慷慨协助帝国内政部与法务部。因为她很清楚，我们神圣的职责对帝国的利益至关重要。更不用提，她非常尊重自己的王朝定下的律法。”
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect, on the other hand, speaks softly, and yet, you can hear every word as if she were standing directly beside you:{/n} "Your predecessor, Lady Theodora — may the light of the Throne illuminate her path in death — always sought to address the needs of both the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites, because she realised how blessed and important our work is for the good of the Imperium — to say nothing of the fact that she honoured the laws of her own dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}行政官以轻柔的声音开了口。尽管她的声音很轻，但每个字你都听得清清楚楚，就仿佛她站在你身边一样。{/n}“您的前任行商浪人，西奥多拉夫人，愿黄金王座的光芒照亮她的灵魂之路。她生前从不吝惜资源，慷慨协助帝国内政部与法务部。因为她很清楚，我们神圣的职责对帝国的利益至关重要。更不用提，她非常尊重自己的王朝定下的律法。”

languages.text: {n}Die Präfektin wiederum spricht leise, aber du verstehst jedes ihrer Worte, als stünde sie direkt neben dir:{/n} "Eure Vorgängerin, Lady Theodora – möge das Licht des Throns ihren Weg auch im Tode erhellen –, hat sich stets um die Bedürfnisse des Adeptus Administratum und des Adeptus Arbites gesorgt, da sie erkannt hatte, wie segensreich und wichtig unsere Arbeit für das Wohl des Imperiums ist ... und natürlich hat sie die Gesetze ihrer eigenen Dynastie geehrt."
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect, on the other hand, speaks softly, and yet, you can hear every word as if she were standing directly beside you:{/n} "Your predecessor, Lady Theodora — may the light of the Throne illuminate her path in death — always sought to address the needs of both the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites, because she realised how blessed and important our work is for the good of the Imperium — to say nothing of the fact that she honoured the laws of her own dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Präfektin wiederum spricht leise, aber du verstehst jedes ihrer Worte, als stünde sie direkt neben dir:{/n} "Eure Vorgängerin, Lady Theodora – möge das Licht des Throns ihren Weg auch im Tode erhellen –, hat sich stets um die Bedürfnisse des Adeptus Administratum und des Adeptus Arbites gesorgt, da sie erkannt hatte, wie segensreich und wichtig unsere Arbeit für das Wohl des Imperiums ist ... und natürlich hat sie die Gesetze ihrer eigenen Dynastie geehrt."

languages.text: {n}一方で、総監は静かに話すが、その声はまるであなたのすぐそばに立っているかのように、すべての言葉がはっきりと聞こえる。{/n}「あなたの前任者であるレディ・シオドーラ…あぁ、彼女の死において王座の光が彼女の道を照らしますように…彼女は常に帝国行政局と高等裁定局の両方のニーズに対応する方法を模索しておられました。なぜなら、彼女は私たちの仕事が帝国の利益に取ってどれほど喜ばしいもので、重要なものであるかを理解していたから、それと自身の王朝の法を守っていました」
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect, on the other hand, speaks softly, and yet, you can hear every word as if she were standing directly beside you:{/n} "Your predecessor, Lady Theodora — may the light of the Throne illuminate her path in death — always sought to address the needs of both the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites, because she realised how blessed and important our work is for the good of the Imperium — to say nothing of the fact that she honoured the laws of her own dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}一方で、総監は静かに話すが、その声はまるであなたのすぐそばに立っているかのように、すべての言葉がはっきりと聞こえる。{/n}「あなたの前任者であるレディ・シオドーラ…あぁ、彼女の死において王座の光が彼女の道を照らしますように…彼女は常に帝国行政局と高等裁定局の両方のニーズに対応する方法を模索しておられました。なぜなら、彼女は私たちの仕事が帝国の利益に取ってどれほど喜ばしいもので、重要なものであるかを理解していたからです」

languages.text: {n}Prefekt ise alçak sesle konuşuyor ancak ağzından çıkan her kelime, sanki yanı başındaymış gibi bir netlikle duyuluyor.{/n} "Selefiniz Leydi Theodora... Ölümünde Taht'ın ışığı yolunu aydınlatsın, her daim hem Adeptus Administratum'un hem de Adeptus Arbites'in ihtiyaçlarını karşılamaya çalışmıştır. İmparatorluk'un iyiliği için yaptığımız işin kutsiyetinin ve öneminin farkında olmuştur. Kendi hanedanlığının yasalarına kesinkes uyduğu gerçeğinden bahsetmiyorum bile."
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect, on the other hand, speaks softly, and yet, you can hear every word as if she were standing directly beside you:{/n} "Your predecessor, Lady Theodora — may the light of the Throne illuminate her path in death — always sought to address the needs of both the Adeptus Administratum and the Adeptus Arbites, because she realised how blessed and important our work is for the good of the Imperium — to say nothing of the fact that she honoured the laws of her own dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Prefekt ise alçak sesle konuşuyor ancak ağzından çıkan her kelime, sanki yanı başındaymış gibi bir netlikle duyuluyor.{/n} "Selefiniz Leydi Theodora... Ölümünde Taht'ın ışığı yolunu aydınlatsın, her daim hem Adeptus Administratum'un hem de Adeptus Arbites'in ihtiyaçlarını karşılamaya çalışmıştır. İmparatorluk'un iyiliği için yaptığımız işin kutsiyetinin ve öneminin farkında olmuştur. Kendi hanedanlığının yasalarına kesinkes uyduğu gerçeğinden bahsetmiyorum bile."
